description:
It's impossible to attach a RBD volume because of a typo in 'nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py', the libvirt_volume_drivers has a key named 'rdb' where it shall be named 'rbd'.

Paste : http://paste.openstack.org/show/3629/
title: Can't attach RBD volume due to typo

comments.content:
It's impossible to attach a RBD volume because of a typo in 'nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py', the libvirt_volume_drivers has a key named 'rdb' where it shall be named 'rbd'.

Paste : http://paste.openstack.org/show/3629/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~francois-charlier

comments.content: There's a review pending for this bug : https://review.openstack.org/2073

commit 35df6a4714996c0e40f0f32822d0568660bdf206
Author: Fran��ois Charlier <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Dec 5 17:26:44 2011 +0100

    Fixes a typo preventing attaching RBD volumes.
    
    A typo in spelling 'rbd' as 'rdb' prevents attaching RBD volumes
    to instances.
    
    Fixes bug 900359.
    
    Change-Id: I872369a21b5935c37c4299f3f748d2d133a78bb3
